Bio

Rosey&#039;s cosmic funk on her debut album, Dirty Child, is inspired by this world&#039;s most basic need: love. She soaks herself in its beauty and works against its complexities for a magical carpet ride of emotion. It&#039;s distinctly focused with an urban appeal while rooted in rock, and a bit comparable to the likes of Poe, Fiona Apple, and Beth Orton. Rosey writes from the heart and it works brilliantly.
